title: EastEnders fans in tears as Jean Slater discovers Daniel is dead
text:
Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

EastEnders viewers were left in tears tonight as Jean Slater discovered that her love interest Daniel had died.

Over the last few months, fans have been left touched by Daniel, played by Ade Edmonson, and Jean's blossoming friendship and romance in the cancer ward.

The pair were initially at odds with one another due to Daniel's cynical outlook on life.

Tonight, Jean spoke warmly about how she wanted her family, and most importantly Stacey, to meet Daniel.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC / Jack Barnes)

However Jean discovered the devastating news that Daniel was dead after a heartbreaking phone call from his friend.

As Kat and Mo asked what was wrong, Jean replied: "That was Daniel's neighbour. He went for a drink with him on Monday night and he found him... found him dead."

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Struggling to take in the news, Jean continued: "Daniel's dead."

Fans flocked to Twitter to comment on the heartbreaking scene.

One tweeted: "Aw Jean finding out Daniel’s died is heartbreaking, she finally had some happiness and he’s gone #eastenders."

While another remarked: "Aww noo. Daniel's dead. I loved @AdrianEdmondson in #EastEnders."

A third remarked: "Poor Jean, her and Daniel would have been such an adorable couple."

*EastEnders returns tomorrow at 8pm on BBC One
description: Eastenders fans have been left touched by Daniel, played by Ade Edmonson, and Jean's blossoming friendship and romance in the cancer ward
